commodities.event
Interface ContractSelectionListener

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
Graph, PricePanel, TestGraphManager, TestManager
public interface ContractSelectionListener
extends EventListener

The ContractSelectionListener is an EventListener that listens for contracts to be selected.

Version:
1.0
Author:
J.R. Titko
Updated:
2004.11.11

Method Summary
 void selectContract(ContractSelectionEvent e)
          Invoked when the contract selection changes.
